context_bundle.summary: Play audio on Windows PC via MCP from remote session. Uses scheduled task with Interactive logon to access desktop audio session.

onboarding.quick_start: Script: X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\play-sound.ps1 | Usage: play-sound.ps1 "C:\Windows\Media\tada.wav" | Key: ScheduledTask with -LogonType Interactive bypasses session isolation
known_errors: Direct SoundPlayer.PlaySync() silent in MCP context - use scheduled task
Task must use -LogonType Interactive to access audio devices
